alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:06PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN COLUMBIA AND EAST CENTRAL SAUK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baraboo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Lake Wisconsin, West Baraboo, Merrimac, Harmony Grove, Okee, Interstate 90/94 Interchange, and Devils Lake St Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90/94 mile marker 110 and near mile marker 112. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 219 and 221. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
